availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Marcus "Mark" D. Leroy (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Peter V. Leroy and Jane S. Leroy. Married to Fannie E. Gray Leroy in Lyon County, Kentucky, on December 27, 1865. Resident in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 315B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000321364.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War) NARA RG 110, Lyon County, KY, June 1863, p. 16.
Find A Grave, "Mark D. LeRoy (1836-1910)," Memorial #42571337, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42571337 (accessed May 18, 2021).
